Q95.title: Apple Inc.
Q95.description: Apple Inc. is an American multinational technology company that specializes in consumer electronics, computer software, and online services. The company was founded by Steve Jobs, Steve Wozniak, and Ronald Wayne in April 1976.

Q198.title: Steve Jobs
Q198.description: Steven Paul Jobs was an American business magnate, industrial designer, investor, and media proprietor. He was the co-founder, chairman, and CEO of Apple Inc.

Q2283.title: Microsoft Corporation
Q2283.description: Microsoft Corporation is an American multinational technology corporation which produces computer software, consumer electronics, personal computers, and related services. Founded by Bill Gates and Paul Allen.

Q5083.title: Redmond
Q5083.description: Redmond is a city in King County, Washington, United States, located 15 miles east of Seattle. It is the headquarters of Microsoft Corporation.

Q1223.title: Washington
Q1223.description: Washington is a state in the Pacific Northwest region of the United States. It is known for its technology industry and is home to companies like Microsoft and Amazon.

Q99.title: California
Q99.description: California is a state in the Western United States, located along the Pacific Coast. It is home to Silicon Valley and many technology companies including Apple Inc.

Q65.title: Los Angeles
Q65.description: Los Angeles is a major city in Southern California, United States. It is the second most populous city in the United States.

Q1297.title: Chicago
Q1297.description: Chicago is the most populous city in the U.S. state of Illinois and the third most populous city in the United States.

Q30.title: United States
Q30.description: The United States of America is a federal republic consisting of 50 states, a federal district, five major self-governing territories, and various possessions.

Q100.title: Boston
Q100.description: Boston is the capital and most populous city of the Commonwealth of Massachusetts in the United States.

Q62.title: San Francisco
Q62.description: San Francisco is a cultural, commercial, and financial center in Northern California. It is part of the San Francisco Bay Area.

Q16555.title: Houston
Q16555.description: Houston is the most populous city in Texas and the fourth most populous city in the United States.

Q3176522.title: Jeff Keppinger
Q3176522.description: Jeff Keppinger is a former American professional baseball infielder who played in Major League Baseball.

Q848117.title: Houston Astros
Q848117.description: The Houston Astros are an American professional baseball team based in Houston, Texas. They compete in Major League Baseball as a member of the American League West division.

Q487999.title: Gainesville
Q487999.description: Gainesville is a city in and the county seat of Alachua County, Florida, United States.
